modName: Angel And Fallen Race Beta 3.0 Test (Updated)
summary: This is An Updated Version of the Test Mod On Steam
descriptionHtml:
This is not the complete mod this mod is Under Construction 
This is an updated version
angelic and fallen argioan and khajiit

we uploaded this mod specifically to test the mod on another computer then we thought to our selves lets make the test mod public so we can gain feedback and see how the mod fairs as it sits now... we will be releasing the full mod sometime this year 2016 then ghost the main person working on this mod with me has decided to work on a totally different mod so it might be sometime before you see a angel and fallen beta 4.0 the mod he has chosen to do is a sanguinarian vampire race 

this mod is still playable 

we want to know from you the players of skyrim what we should change or fix or even your ideas for the mod 

this is what you will need to run the mod 

skse: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url] 

fnis : [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?[/url] 
If you need more instruction check this out : [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6MqZ-EPdBvk]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6MqZ-EPdBvk[/url] 

animated dragon wings : [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/?[/url] 

flying mod beta: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15775/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15775/?[/url] 
my scripts for flying mod included
author: Ghost
